DOC.brief_title: The Correlation Between Health Status Self-Assessment Health Condition , Relation Health Services Utilization
DOC.detailed_description: Background : The World Health Organization define `` health '' state physical , mental social well-being individual , absence disease illness . Health self-assessment almost never present medical clinical model , define `` health '' absence physical disease . On one hand , say correlation definition , others argue self-assessment health always consistent clinical health status evaluation . Few study examine relationship self-assessment health status among resident State Israel general among population reside Galilee Western Galilee area particular . The study present contradictory finding health perception among Jewish Arab population . There 600,000 resident Western Galilee various population sector , include Jews , Arabs , Druze others . This composition population pretty much reflect general composition population Galilee area . Study objective : This study aim examine relation health status self-assessment health condition , relation healthcare service utilization , also identify profile ass health condition mediocre poor general population accord nationality . Methods : A cross-sectional study conduct among 250 visitor age 18 outpatient clinic Galilee Medical Center ( former Western Galilee Hospital ) : opthalmology , dental , otolaryngology ( ENT ) orthopedic . The target population group study adult resident Western Galilee area . The sampling random . For aim survey five sampling day select four outpatient clinic . On sample day visitor different outpatient clinic offer complete self-administered structured questionnaire adapt specifically study .
DOC.criteria: Adult resident Western Galilee area Non literate visitor
